channel.title: Help me with my auto typer/clicker please
channel.description:
ok so basically i have made a script that will click the buttons i need but i need help with what to put instead of until false.
i want it to click the buttons 20 times then close all the windows that it creates.
then repeat the whole thing over again
[code] program New;
begin repeat keydown(17); Keydown(18); keydown(76); sleep(10); Keyup(17); Keyup(18); Keyup(76); until false end. [/code]
i now need to know what to put with until to make it only do it 20 times.
then i need help with closing all the 20 windows that it opened up!
this is the bitmap i got for closing the window....
[code] close button := BitmapFromString(20, 21, 'z78DAB5964B922B29' + '0C45B78410E2330404FB5FD23B90E98AAE6847F7E879A0C848630' + 'E92AE2ECEB9C92ACBD6DC63FFE54FCEB5F80EA663CEDD97F85CA3' + '8EA2AB9591C32A45CC56CE3DF9B29C535D294B8A444D6925DBBAD' + 'EA83675BC315A56FD89AA6185E4B1FA4C26DB81695ADBABC787BE' + '66F592D7EEDAC20E3DB7B456EBD53889175BBDF2255172E5549C9' + '838735CB534DB372EA259E3B43039EDB2C0696B6A9C33E85EC14C' + 'A38794A38E9C06E76157B23DBB19C4C683F4D93A5CAF6DCD26A5D' + 'F3A44B8967DB54BAF65657BE9A73EC29B624E4CD073DE16E1F634' + '6F7D7489352D1E538FB57755B1A7E6777D7D59BB4BF5E5CDCA86D' + '88B40D47CCEE639B1923290979EECD83F4171939BDDB8B17F7A71' + '333DF5EFE4CB2BB833F63E354B7DB9E59EF0647772D4321FE22E7' + '3CEF859430D0FCB4DEFFECECE29E5D3E524EC3FD89FD3E8BBE7D6' + '31BAD36553F17D7AED3437CEEEDA79F1ECF9E867DC3E1E627872F' + 'CB71AFF412C97185EE2D152FAB23E5A8C0E37C6E527E5DF5CCBC6' + 'C99FDE7DAA7A3A78BAB6BEEC76B4AD705D1D2E3FF84624BB0237C' + '4536789F3723BDC26F317B796CE04D557ABCF73B2416D977DCBE5' + 'F6EE2BD10F340D923CCF0637C4E689FE2259B8E36707D7F9AAF1A' + '3CC4C7C7A7AF4797A3AD2FA6F4FA002428E29EDA84BA1D005B871' + '096FCC0D3D5BDF5AA4FD7011D3D5CC9988688578158B7B943B8FF' + '1C7434A2ADFFA6E25CE75C694C564C71C259775E35373611C5A14' + 'B826F9A7FB49CFC43566A194C0741CE2A93C13FFAA3DE799FC7FF' + '2C53CE01654248BA193497422B9CB849B658EC0FC7E66E4D461BC' + '73974F3D5F56B9153EF9CA374A36FD7D92B56D53314BF1C420640' + '1178F4DC7140AAFF3882AE1B33CA001A3DA4B9F4AD69BDDBA9E10' + 'BE126B8A978B2A30BF6F7A6E70510B9932E3A9887AD52D610886F' + '9AAD1378258549B8920EB98E2A5B72FBB61E8E954BEE0152527EE' + '82C3C56D6D45FF4627D353F314DC8B8E30E08EF09E13230854435' + '0E37A9DEDD2B74D19F643440437B20F44D40E11AFC60F7169C303' + 'A1B7F899B8820109DC1A8EBA42687073B01162096F7F9D2992F45' + '65BD8FEF13D6E935BF973DFF97DC68189EDC6632C0EB1D840C915' + '3D735370A84F859F4C2B99A21CE512746E474C64C71C5EB55079A' + 'CD107C0E9CEDC7131A049EACF6028535FB0D67397C97578E16C58' + 'CBF15E724CCC8E11D98CBC26444B5598F78425435CA1ACA035444' + '7C621F41E35BC9A99CE64D53995F5C42563EE84F8886471632652' + '7AEED012D58567C19450056E6032FC4838332901FDA072B2C85CE' + '68D67E3EA17503263EC7007B5FD749F551E86C1AA3DD377E7B60A' + '22AC1189BD6994440C3C4F9E158F3D71F12DFA644F3F96C89609A' + 'D5694D34326D6A0BC2941B8366830BF85B83A05E5BF4343DCC4BC' + 'F56FFFB3BAFFDFE6430CC7F0E31F412954A2'); [/code]
please help me out thanks
htya

item.title: Help me with my auto typer/clicker please
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

wow thanks dude i actually never thought of doing that lol!!

thanks a million

item.source: Help me with my auto typer/clicker please

item.title: Help me with my auto typer/clicker please
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

program New; var i: integer; begin for i := 1 to 20 do begin keydown(17); Keydown(18); keydown(76); sleep(10); Keyup(17); Keyup(18); Keyup(76); end; end.

You could use ATL+F4 to close the windows, just look up the key codes in Kyle’s thread in the tutorial section.

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with my auto typer/clicker please

item.title: Help me with my auto typer/clicker please
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

ok so basically i have made a script that will click the buttons i need but i need help with what to put instead of until false.

i want it to click the buttons 20 times then close all the windows that it creates.

then repeat the whole thing over again

program New;
 
begin
 repeat
    keydown(17);
    Keydown(18);
    keydown(76);
 sleep(10);
    Keyup(17);
    Keyup(18);
    Keyup(76);
until false
end.

i now need to know what to put with until to make it only do it 20 times.

then i need help with closing all the 20 windows that it opened up!
